text: Nights of Farewell () is a 1965 Soviet-French drama film directed by Isaak Menaker and Jean Dréville.Показ фильма состоится в библиотеке имени Ивана БунинаПОКАЗ ФИЛЬМА «ТРЕТЬЯ МОЛОДОСТЬ» СОСТОИТСЯ В БИБЛИОТЕКЕ ИМЕНИ ИВАНА БУНИНАВасильев представит зрителям в Красноярске фильмы об Улановой == Plot == The film tells about the young dancer Marius Petipa, who is invited to St. Petersburg, which will completely change his life.Третья молодость == Cast == * Gilles Ségal as Marius Petipa * Oleg Strizhenov as Pyotr Tchaikovsky * Jacques Ferrière as Anton Minkh * Natalya Velichko as Mashenka Surovshchikova * Nikolay Cherkasov as Gedeonov * Nikolay Trofimov as Petrov * Gennadiy Nilov as Lev Ivanov * Alla Larionova as Lyubov LeonidovnaТретья молодость (1965) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1965 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films Category:1965 drama films
